entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Midland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 01:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: ENE 13 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
